chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Jala Bandevin, p. 86—Gray-haired Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is an imposing woman despite being nearly a hand shorter than Moiraine. She ran off immediately to tell Elaida (or someone else in the Tower) who it was they had captured at North Harbor.
